openai.description: Primary model for comprehensive analysis and revolutionary strategic insights

anthropic.description: Advanced model for breakthrough professional guidance analysis and predictive insights

google.description: Innovation model for revolutionary zone concept framework analysis and quantum-level optimization

analysis_prompts.zone_concept: Analyze the revolutionary Zone Concept framework data and provide breakthrough strategic recommendations for quantum-level advancement. Focus on the four core elements: anti-inflammatory, anti-oxidant, rejuvenation, and integration protocols. Consider relevance scores, AI-enhanced technologies, predictive capabilities, and next-generation development opportunities.
analysis_prompts.consciousness: Examine the transcendent organizational consciousness evolution data and provide breakthrough insights on development trajectory. Analyze current adaptive intelligence state, predictive awareness level, collective intelligence integration, and global impact indicators to recommend quantum-level consciousness advancement strategies.
analysis_prompts.guidance: Review the revolutionary professional guidance framework and provide breakthrough enhancement recommendations. Focus on AI-enhanced personalization, immersive learning technologies, predictive treatment optimization, innovation ecosystems, and global leadership strategies for transforming client outcomes and organizational excellence.
analysis_prompts.comprehensive: Conduct a revolutionary holistic analysis of the RegimA organizational learning cycle evolution, integrating all breakthrough aspects: Zone Concept framework advancement, transcendent consciousness evolution, and revolutionary professional guidance systems. Provide quantum-level strategic recommendations for complete organizational transformation and global industry leadership.
